detail_desc: Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with shaping seams. Elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets, back pockets and ribbed hems.
Short skirt in soft, glittery velour with a wrapover front, covered elastication at the back of the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidery detail on the chest and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels,a button at the front, chest pocket with a decorative handkerchief and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently rounded hems with short slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft chunky knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and roll edges.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels, raglan sleeves and buttons. Patch front pockets, a sewn-in waistband at the back and a back vent. Unlined.
T-shirts in soft jersey. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.
5-pocket shorts in washed, superstretch denim with embroidered appliqués and a print motif. Adjustable elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, and slim legs.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, A-line skirt in cotton twill with buttons down the front and fake welt pockets at the top.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood, zip down the front, side pockets and a small appliqué at the top. Contrasting colour jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a turn-down collar and chest pockets. Long sleeves with a button at the cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. Jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Knitted jacket with a soft fleece lining, hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, front pockets and jersey inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs. Trims in contrasting colour jersey around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a zipped leg pocket. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Slippers in supersoft faux fur with patterned soles.
Short, sleeveless top in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a sweetheart neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Protective case in imitation leather for Airpods with a lid and a carabiner hook on top.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.

Derby shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes and open lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm. The shoes are made partly from recycled polyester.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Shaping bikers in microfibre with an extra-high waist. The bikers have a sculpting effect on the whole of the waist area and a push-up effect on the bum with the help of mesh reinforcements and rounded seams.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with decorative zips at the top and decorative seams.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose twill weave with a high, elasticated drawstring wast and zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets with a decorative flap and button, and tapered legs with creases.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets and ribbed hems.
Shirt in a soft cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Stylish coat woven in a wool blend with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Fastening with three buttons at the front, a chest pocket, diagonal welt pockets at the sides and two inner pockets, one at each side. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat and the polyester content of the lining are recycled.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Calf-length kaftan in a softly draping weave with a sheen. V-neck, short sleeves and a pleat at the back for added volume.
Slides with wide imitation leather straps over the foot. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.

Off-the-shoulder dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a wide, scalloped flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and an asymmetric, wrapover skirt with a flounced trim. Unlined.
Shorts in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ankle-length, circular skirt in a woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with a zip and button at one side.
Mittens in a soft knit with ribbing at the cuffs. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam and concealed zip at the waist, and a flared skirt. Lined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and decorative buttons at the top. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Lace and mesh push-up bra with underwired, lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Shorts in lightweight, patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets, a back pocket with a small fabric appliqué, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with an interactive sequin motif on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Bras in cotton jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hooded jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with buttons down the front. High waist with covered elastication at the back and pleats at the front for added width. Unlined.
Advent calendar in paper with gold-coloured print motifs, a satin ribbon for hanging and 24 windows containing accessories in different sizes and designs made from metal, plastic and glass.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Round-necked blouse in airy crinkled jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck, balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an overlocked hem.
Metal hair grips decorated with plastic beads. Width approx. 2.5 cm. Length 8 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a foldover edge in faux fur at the top and a decorative grosgrain bow at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Elasticated bracelet in metal decorated with sparkly glass stones. Width 1 cm.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Fine-knit over-the-knee socks.
Court shoes with pointed toes and block heels. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7.5 cm.

Long dress in an airy weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Frills down the front that continue down the back, long dolman sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey underdress.

Blouse woven in an airy cotton blend in a relaxed fit with a round neckline, small frilled collar and a drawstring at the top. Concealed buttons down the front, yoke at the back, dropped shoulders with seams at the top and long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in a soft weave with concealed buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt and pleats for extra width. Short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Straight-cut, knitted coat with a faux fur look, notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and concealed side pockets. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some alpaca wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Cropped, fitted top in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a sweetheart neckline. Vertical seams with concealed elastication to create a draped effect and a concealed silicone trim top and bottom for best fit. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and a rounded front.
Round-necked top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short puff sleeves and a text print on the front.
Soft shoes in organic cotton with lacing at the front. Cotton jersey linings and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Pleats at the top, a belt at the waist, side pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
